</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns [[true]] if the game simulation is paused due to some system event like a dialog or pause menu or when user has Alt+Tab-ed (except when -nopause start up param is used). Relevant to SP, in MP simulation does not get paused.

{
	[[if]] ([[isGamePaused]]) [[exitWith]] {}; 
	<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>...do stuff</value></part></template>
};</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[isGameFocused]], [[isUIContext]], [[canSuspend]], [[isRemoteExecuted]], [[isRemoteExecutedJIP]], [[serverCommand]]
